name: kbroman.github.io
body:
### Karl Broman

[Karl Broman](http://biostat.wisc.edu/~kbroman) is Professor in the [Department of Biostatistics and Medical Informatics](http://biostat.wisc.edu) at the [University of Wisconsin-Madison](http://wisc.edu); research in statistical genetics; developer of [R/qtl](http://rqtl.org) (for [R](http://r-project.org)).

- [web](http://biostat.wisc.edu/~kbroman)
- [github](http://github.com/kbroman)
- [blog](http://kbroman.wordpress.com)
- [@kwbroman](http://twitter.com/status/kwbroman)

- [git/github tutorial](http://kbroman.github.io/github_tutorial)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
